code:
import time
import requests

class RateLimiter:
    def __init__(self, rate_limit):
        self.rate_limit = rate_limit
        self.reset_time = time.monotonic()

    def should_wait(self):
        now = time.monotonic()
        time_since_reset = now - self.reset_time
        if (time_since_reset > self.rate_limit):
            self.reset_time = now
            return False
        return True

def request_with_rate_limit(url, rate_limiter):
    if rate_limiter.should_wait():
        time.sleep(rate_limiter.rate_limit - time_since_reset)
    rate_limiter.reset_time = time.monotonic()
    response = requests.get(url)
    return response

rate_limiter = RateLimiter(1) # Limit to 1 request per second
url = 'https://api.example.com/data'

for _ in range(5):
    response = request_with_rate_limit(url, rate_limiter)
    print(response.status_code)
prompt: Rate limiting ile API request yapan fonksiyon yaz.
